properties.areaDesc: Big Island Southeast Waters; Pailolo Channel; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 3:41PM HST until February 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...East winds 20 to 25 knots with higher gusts. Seas 7 to
11 feet.

* WHERE...Pailolo Channel, Big Island Leeward Waters and Big
Island Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY
